reviewText: My husband bought this video for his winter golf "fix:!  He said it was helpful and he got some helpful tips.
All I have to do now is remember everything this video has to offer when I get on the course.

overall I enjoyed the DVD. My swing had all sorts of kinks in it that I was trying to work out. I am novice when it comes to golf, however I am competitive and just want to become halfway decent when it comes to this frustrating game. I thought the DVD certainly helped my game, it had good tips and drills you could practice on your own. The only downfall is David Leadbetter is very dry and boring in this video.

I bought this as a surprise for my Hubby.  SURPRISE!  First he's glued to the TV, then he's on the golf course trying this out!  Ladies, this is THE PERFECT GIFT for the woman who wants time to go shopping! I love it!

just received the video watched both really good. there is a lot of info so I will watch the video over again and take one lesson at a time (write it down ) on a 3X5 card and take it to the golf course with me . Very informative for a beginner golf person .  GO SEAHAWKS
This is a great beginner set of DVD's.  David walks through all the basics.  It's filmed so that when you are done watching it, you will think you were the one going through the training.
Very good DVD hope to improve my game and reduce my score by 10 with some practice. Waiting for spring now.

Excellent price. David's DVDs are good. I recommend them to all.
I bought this DVD for my friend also. He likes it
My buddy who i bought it for said the video covers everything from preshot routine to the putting stroke and everything in between.

David Leadbetter does a really good job of explaining and using a student to show how it is done. His training and practice tips are really great. It's a lot to take in a sitting, I would look at it in several siting, for there is so much good information in this DVD.
The coach is good here. He is easy to understand and it is easy to apply, except when facing a par 3 with a one stroke lead
